<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blessed One Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1910) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 162 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Blessed One](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=51)

</column>

---

You are touched by a deity and gifted with the ability to alleviate the suffering of others. You gain the [_lay on hands_](/Spells.aspx?ID=395) devotion spell. It costs 1 Focus Point to cast a focus spell. This feat grants a focus pool of 1 Focus Point that you can recover using the [Refocus](/Actions.aspx?ID=71) activity. You can Refocus by meditating, whether you reflect on the deity granting the blessing or not, allowing your blessing to refill your focus pool. Your devotion spells from the blessed one archetype are divine spells.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the blessed one archetype.

<title level="2">Blessed One Dedication leads to...</title>
[Blessed Denial](/Feats.aspx?ID=1913), [Blessed Sacrifice](/Feats.aspx?ID=1911), [Blessed Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=1912)
name: Blessed One Dedication
